Package org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer

Lazy Query Container is a Vaadin framework addon which provides lazy loading data container implementation for Vaadin tables.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Query
    Interface for loading data in batches and saving modifications.
    QueryDefinition
    Interface for defining properties for a query.
    QueryFactory
    Interface for constructing queries based on query definition and sort state.
    QueryView
    Interface for sorting and browsing data from a business service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBeanQuery<T>
    Simple generics bean query implementation which dynamically injects missing query definition properties to CompositeItems.
    BeanQueryFactory<Q extends AbstractBeanQuery>
    QueryFactory implementation for BeanQuery.
    CompositeItem
    CompositeItem enables joining multiple items as single item.
    EntityContainer<T>
    EntityContainer enables loading JPA entities in non lazy manner in single read operation using same query backend as LCQ.
    EntityQuery<E>
    Entity query implementation which dynamically injects missing query definition properties to CompositeItems.
    EntityQueryDefinition
    Defines entity query definition to be used with JPA entity managers.
    EntityQueryFactory
    Query factory to be used with EntityQuery.
    LazyEntityContainer<T>
    LazyEntityContainer enables using JPA entities with lazy batch loading, filter, sort and buffered writes.
    LazyIdList<T>
    Lazy ID list implementation used in LazyQueryContainer.getItemIds method.
    LazyQueryContainer
    LazyQueryContainer provides lazy loading of items from business services.
    LazyQueryDefinition
    Default implementation of Query Definition.
    LazyQueryView
    Lazy loading implementation of QueryView.
    NaturalNumberIdsList
    Natural numbers list implementation used in LazyQueryContainer.getItemIds method.
    QueryContainer<T>
    QueryContainer enables loading items in non lazy manner with same query backend as LCQ.
    QueryItemStatusColumnGenerator
    Helper class for Vaadin tables to generate status column.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    QueryItemStatus
    Enumeration defining the query item states.

Package org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer Description

Lazy Query Container is a Vaadin framework addon which provides lazy loading data container implementation for Vaadin tables. Lazy Query Container is read only container and data modifications are designed to be done through a business delegate. The QueryFactory and Query interfaces are designed to be application specific and should apply the business delegate for querying data from business services.
